title: The Dusty Airlock
description: The bartender at the Dusty Airlock knows everyone's business. With the right approach, valuable information flows as freely as the drinks.

free: Previous crew came through a few months back
The Dictator has a Vargr chauffeur - one of the good ones
easy_6: Previous crew were jerks - got drunk, caused trouble
They left in a hurry, didn't pay their bar tab
moderate_8: Someone at the port office knows exactly what those crew members did
The volcano survey isn't routine - there are real concerns
Vargr here have it okay, but there's a ceiling
hard_10: Rumor is they sabotaged their own ship to avoid the survey
Masterton's been talking about evacuation plans
The chauffeur's the only Vargr who's really trusted

atmosphere_notes: Small bar, regulars know each other
